page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: {HOUSING }Houses built before 1960 are about 10% of village. Houses built 1960-70 amount to 50%. 40% of houses are less than 10 years old. Old houses were made with hand made bricks and pantile roofs, farm houses were big, 5/6 bedrooms, with ceilings made with straw covered with gypsum. 25% are factory built, of concrete and concrete tile roofs. Houses built since 1970 are brick and tile roofs. They have 2/3/4 bed rooms with central heating. 75% of houses are in 3 estates. The original village was ribbon developed. The village is centred on the cross roads with School, church, chapel, shops, garage and telephone kiosk within 50 yards. 70% of houses are owner occupied.
